DOC.brief_summary: Approximately 126 subject schedule undergo cataract surgery phacoemulsification , randomize even allocation ( 1:1:1 ) either Acuvail , Xibrom , Nevanac . Subjects instruct begin dose study medication operative eye day surgery continue dose day surgery . Beginning one hour surgery , 1 drop study medication instill operating room staff approximately every 15 minute total 3 dos . At designated time paracentesis perform start cataract procedure least 0.15 cc aqueous humor collect . The sample immediately store dry ice ship laboratory analysis .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Peak Aqueous Penetration Acuvail ( Ketorolac 0.45 % ) , Xibrom ( Bromfenac 0.09 % ) , Nevanac ( Nepafenac 0.1 % ) Patients Undergoing Phacoemulsification
DOC.criteria: Subjects must 18 year age old . Scheduled cataract surgery phacoemulsification . Subject must willing comply study requirement willing give inform consent . Any subject history uveitis active iritis . Subject previous eye surgery , exception refractive surgery , within 6 month . No ocular use prostaglandin within 2 week surgery . Use oral , injectable topical ophthalmic steroid , nonsteroidal antiinflammatory ( NSAIDS ) immunosuppressant within 14 day prior surgery . Contraindications NSAIDS . Active ocular infection .
